title: Redesign recommendation cards to Consequential style
description:
Redesign RecommendationsPage cards:
- Dark card bg #1A1A1A, border rgba(255,255,255,0.1), radius 12px, padding 24px
- Header row: LEFT = category badge (green pill: 'High CPA', 'Low ROAS'), RIGHT = large impact metric (32-40px, #9AE65C for positive)
- Below badge: provider info in gray (e.g. 'Facebook Ads • $1,200/day')
- Body: bold white headline (18-20px), gray description (#A1A1A1)
- Footer: Approve (green filled), Reject (red outlined) buttons
- Grid: 2 columns desktop, 1 mobile, gap 16-24px
